Merchant

You made a living buying and selling goods. You could have set up shop in a city or travelled with your goods from place to place. Many a trinket and treasure have moved through your hands and you’ve got a knack for appraising new rarities.

Ability Score Increase. Your Charisma, Intelligence, or Wisdom increases by 1. Your Charisma, Intelligence, or Constitution increases by 1.

Experienced Haggler. You have advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) and Charisma (Deception) checks made when attempting to barter or trade. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.06ZMWZ3NTPZUN3S0]{Experienced Haggler}

Discerning Eye. You can always arrive at a rough estimate of the current monetary value for any non magical or common magical item. Whenever you learn the identity of an item, you gain a rough estimate of its current monetary value. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.6TTQWUU2FMKZ55OC]{Discerning Eye}

Skills. Choose one from: Deception, History, Insight, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand.

Tools. You gain proficiency with one of the following: Vehicles (land), an artisan’s tool, forgery kit, herbalism kit.

Languages. Two of your choice.
